entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
